item.title: Short CV
item.description:
Khaled Axel Djebbari

PhD Researcher in Environmental Engineering

Department of Civil & Environmental Engineering
University of Connecticut

Research Focus

I am a PhD researcher specializing in the mechanistic behavior, environmental fate, and health impacts of PFASâ€“microplastic co-contaminants. My work integrates multiscale experimentation, molecular simulation, mechanistic toxicology, and reactive transport modeling across soils, aquatic systems, and wastewater infrastructure, with emphasis on predictive understanding and mitigation technologies.
